notes: These are summoned by [[Slime]]. They are a weaker version of it. The only wild spawns of this creatures are conditioned to the state of [[The Mummy's Curse World Change]].
history:
Spawns of this creature were only added with [[The Mummy's Curse World Change]] on [[Updates/9.1|Summer Update 2011]]. Prior to this update, they could only be found as summons of [[Slime]]s.
They used to be called ''Slimes'' before the [[Updates/11.02|Winter Update 2016]]. This made it impossible to differentiate them from ordinary [[slime]]s.
name: Squidgy Slime
location: [[Horestis Tomb]] during one of the states of [[The Mummy's Curse World Change]].
strategy: Just attack it, it's about as strong as a [[Nomad (Basic)|Nomad]].
